mapper.sql: id, name, supplier_merchant_id, supplier_merchant_name, release_total, release_num, release_start_date, release_end_date, status, effective_start_date, effective_end_date, exclude_dates, description, url, create_date, category, tags, image_url, code, rules_description, per_limited, scopes, scenario_type, coupon_mpus, exclude_mpus, categories, brands, collect_type, points, customer_type, users, coupon_type, coupon_rules
mapper.select: select distinct tags from coupon where tags != ""

select
from coupon where 1=1
and find_in_set(#{mpu,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, coupon_mpus) and scenario_type = 1
or locate(#{mpu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},exclude_mpus) = 0 and scenario_type = 2
or find_in_set(#{category,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, category)
and locate(#{mpu,jdbcType=VARCHAR},exclude_mpus) = 0
and scenario_type = 3

supplier_merchant_id = #{supplierMerchantId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
supplier_merchant_name = #{supplierMerchantName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
